title: 何意味
content: 这是我在2025年11月2号花费一个小时做出来的博客网站，主要就是跟着教程一步一步做，不过网站的搭建还在进行中……眼下后天英语quiz，周末微积分 期中考，线代期中考，作业还没写完…………学在浙大!以及最爱我的d老师This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new My New Post More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
